select seq_pets.nextval from dual
insert into ttm.pets (petId, weight, breed, petBirthDate, petName, petDesc, petGender, petLikeCount, userId) values (#{petId}, #{weight}, #{breed}, #{petBirthDate}, #{petName}, #{petDesc}, #{petGender}, #{petLikeCount}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update ttm.pets set weight = #{weight}, breed = #{breed}, petBirthDate = #{petBirthDate}, petName = #{petName}, petDesc = #{petDesc}, petGender = #{petGender} where petId = #{petId}
